original_text:
**INSTITUTION
Discharge Summary
Name :
**NAME[AAA , BBB]
Acct # :
**ID-NUM
MRN :
**ID-NUM
Admitted :
**DATE[May 10 2007]
Discharged :
**DATE[May 13 2007]
Dict :
**NAME[XXX , WWW]
Attend :
**NAME[ZZZ , YYY]
PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS :
Right knee degenerative joint disease .
SECONDARY DIAGNOSES :
Include :
1. Hypothyroidism .
2. Degenerative joint disease .
3. Morbid obesity .
4. Gastroesophageal reflux disease .
5. Depression and anxiety .
6. Borderline diabetes .
SURGICAL PROCEDURE :
Right quadriceps - sparing total knee joint replacement with surgical navigation .
This was done by Dr. **NAME[YYY ZZZ] with physician assistant **NAME[VVV UUU] on **DATE[May 10 2007] .
CONSULTS :
Consults were made to physical therapy , occupational therapy , social services as well as Dr. **NAME[TTT SSS] for medical management .
History and physical is as per chart without any insertions or deletions .
HOSPITAL COURSE :
Postoperative day #1 :
The patient is without complaints .
No shortness of breath or chest pain .
Vital signs were stable .
Neurovascular was intact .
Foley will be discontinued today .
Start physical therapy .
Weightbearing as tolerated .
We will check H and H .
Postoperative day #2 :
The patient was without complaints .
No chest pain .
No shortness of breath .
The patient reports that the operated leg is buckling with ambulation .
The patient is planning for discharge to home with physical therapy at home .
Postoperative day #3 :
The patient is alert .
Incisions are benign .
H and H of 10.3 and 30.9 .
The patient is independent with gait .
Currently needs assistance x1 with transfers .
The patient is for discharge home today if independent with transfers .
Follow up with Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] in 1 month .
The patient was discharged on postoperative day #3 .
The patient may resume preoperative medications .
Continue aspirin for anticoagulation .
Continue Vicodin for pain control .
Continue physical therapy and occupational therapy .
Weightbearing as tolerated .
Keep the incisions clean and dry .
No driving while on pain medications .
Call the office with any questions , concerns , or complaints .
Go to the emergency department for any chest pain , shortness of breath , calf pain , or swelling .
Followup appointment with Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] in 1 month .
______________________________
**NAME[WWW XXX] , PA-C
HS Job # 954986 / 38640 / 32948
SHY # **ID-NUM
D :
**DATE[May 25 2007] 13:38
T :
**DATE[May 27 2007] 18:07
**CARBON-COPY
